section.title: Borders
section.para: Several visual elements may specify a border. The border definition has a special syntax.

section.title: Border Syntax
section.para: A simple integer specifies a solid x-Pixel border in the default color.
A specific border style can be created by prefixing the border type.
If the border type has a simple value argument the argument can simply be specified without brackets:

section.title: Solid line border
section.para: The line border type is a simple line. The type id is LINE:

tr.td: The line size in pixels (might get scaled)

section.title: Group border
section.para: A draw2d group border. The type id is GROUP:

tr.td: The text of the group border

section.title: Title border
section.para: A draw2d title border. The type id is TITLE:

tr.td: The text of the group border

section.title: Margin border
section.para: A margin border. The type id is MARGIN:

tr.td: The inset of the margin border
